p: In 2015, Lani et al. investigated the antiviral effect of several flavonoids including silymarin against CHIKV using a CPE reduction assay and RT-PCR analysis [ 28]. The authors discovered that silymarin robustly inhibited CHIKV-induced CPE. Mechanistic studies further demonstrated that silymarin inhibited CHIKV infection by targeting the post-entry steps of the viral life cycle.
